meanings.definition: Eriophyids: a type of mite that feeds on plants
meanings.sent1: The eriophyids were found on the leaves of the rose bush.
meanings.sent2: Farmers need to protect their crops from eriophyids to ensure a good harvest.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous eriophyids played hide and seek among the tomato plants.
meanings.sent4: The eriophyids spread across the field like a hungry army of tiny invaders.
meanings.sent5: The delicate dance of the eriophyids on the greenery was a sight to behold.

meanings.definition: Eriophyids: tiny arachnids that can cause damage to crops
meanings.sent1: Careful inspection revealed the presence of eriophyids on the apple trees.
meanings.sent2: Farmers must take action against eriophyids to protect their fields.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous eriophyids painted polka dots on the corn leaves.
meanings.sent4: The eriophyids crept through the crops like silent thieves in the night.
meanings.sent5: The damage caused by the eriophyids left the fields looking like a battlefield.
